articles.title: Simranjit Mann humbles AAP in CM Bhagwant Mann's Sangrur constituency, wins Lok Sabha bypoll by 5,822 votes
articles.description: In a major upset in the Lok Sabha by-elections, the AAP on Sunday lost the Sangrur parliamentary seat vacated by Bhagwant Singh Mann when he became Punjab chief minister to SAD (Amritsar) president Simranjit Singh Mann.
articles.content:
PTI
Chandigarh, June 26

articles.title: Bypolls 2022: BJP continues winning streak by bagging 5 out of 10 segments; setback for SP in Uttar Pradesh, AAP in Punjab
articles.description: While BJP won Rampur and Azamgarh Lok Sabha segments, SAD bagged Sangrur parliamentary constituency. The saffron party also registered victory in three of the four segments in Tripura.
articles.content: Continuing its winning streak, the BJP bagged five out of 10 constituencies that went to byelections on June 23.After the bypoll results, of three Lok Sabha and seven Assembly seats across five state… [+4326 chars]
